name: Qadeer Hakimi
story: Qasim was born in a small town in Afghanistan. He grew up in a family with a strong military tradition, and was trained in various combat techniques from a young age. He joined the militia at the age of 18, and quickly rose through the ranks due to his natural leadership abilities. He has been assigned to various special operations around the Middle East and Central Asia, and is known for his calm-headedness, discipline, and strategic thinking in high-pressure situations. He is determined to prove himself to his superiors and achieve even greater success in the military.
